original_text: “I will remove you from this city. I will put you under the power of a foreign army. I will use them to punish you.
korean_text: 너희를 그 성읍 가운데에서 끌어내어 타국인의 손에 넘겨 너희에게 벌을 내리리니

sentences.original_text: I will remove you from this city.
I will put you under the power of a foreign army.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 이방 군대의 권세 아래에 두겠다.

sentences.original_text: I will use them to punish you.
